aboutProgram.en:
This program is part of a drought response. This program aims to help a total 350 households with income support. Households must live in Longopito or Oldonyiro.
 
Inclusion criteria
Your community has agreed that you are among the most vulnerable in your community. Inclusion criteria are:
  • Widows, divorced, pregnant or lactating women with children under 5 years of age or who have no source of income.
  • Widows or divorced women headed families with no income
  • Families with severely malnourished child or children under 5 years old
  • Poor and vulnerable people of over 60 years
  • Household with chronically ill household head, such as people who are terminal
  • Household listed under HSNP group 2
  • Poor and vulnerable culturally/socially discriminated special interest groups
  • The more vulnerable you are the higher you will be prioritized for assistance
Exclusion criteria
To be eligible you must meet all the exclusion criteria. 
  • You or someone from your household should not employed in the formal sector
  • You or someone from your household should not be owning a business
  • You and your household can not currently receive cash transfers or food aid
Transfer mechanism
This program uses M-Pesa. 
 
Transfer Amount
Total 9000 KES, in two payments of 4500 KES. 
 
Timeline
Both payments will take place in november/december 2020.
